name: Sophia Greenfield
bio: Sophia has over 10 years of experience in nurturing air-purifying plants and helping homes become greener spaces.

name: Liam Carter
bio: Liam specializes in hydroponic systems and soil-free plant nutrition, perfecting the art of sustainable indoor gardening.

name: Ava Patel
bio: Ava blends design and botany to create calming interiors filled with lush greenery and natural balance.

name: Ethan Rivera
bio: Ethan helps plant owners diagnose and treat common indoor plant issues using eco-friendly methods.

name: Mia Chen
bio: Mia has mastered water-efficient plant care, teaching how to keep succulents thriving year-round.
